entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On Linux .NET 6, get unexpected AuthenticationException with HttpWebRequest and wildcard usage #96360
  • Handling Data Loss in ClientWebSocket ReceiveAsync in C# Blazor WASM #96359
  • Unable to run an MVC application using Docker Desktop #96355
  • Web API performance regression after upgrading from .net framework 4.7.2 to asp .net core 6.0 #96351

Closed

  • DotNet doesn't respect encoding of Chinese strings? #96348
  • Intermittent `!AreCetShadowStacksEnabled() || UseSpecialUserModeApc()` assertion when embedding CoreCLR #83437
    Future
  • JsonSourceGenerator InvalidOperationException Unreachable with C# 12 using alias #96313
  • IpAddress subnetwork support #96356
  • Can not create folder when path exists #96353

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement remaining ILGenertorImpl methods, excluding scope. Add max stack calculation for branching. #96362
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Clean up illink suppressions #96361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Investigate #96336 #96358
    needs-area-label
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96352
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove arm64 neardiffer hack #96266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.3.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Investigating impact of a change. #96350
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
